channel.title: Restartserver.bat not working
channel.description:
I am working on my autorestarter and yes I have the start server part, basic, but I need the part that [b]ends[/b] the server first... anyone have the code? what I have currently is...
[code]@echo off color 0a title Jonsmodscape @echo Closing server window... tskill java /a /v @echo Restarting server... java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
and it gives me this error when I run it (with my server currently on)
[code]Stopping Server... 'tskill' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Restarting Server... Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? [/code]
I have this error because my server does not close... help? Yes I do have the latest java update if you help me THANKS! :D

item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

nope… I think I need some download but I already have jdk so thats what I’m wondering

item.title: Restartserver.bat not working
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

no thats not it! he needs to change tskill java bit change the tskil java bit to tskill java /a
then it shud work

so shud look like this:
@echo off
color 0a
title Jonsmodscape
echo Closing server window…
tskill java /a
echo Restarting server…
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

just copy and paste that cos ur code rong…

Read full topic

item.title: Restartserver.bat not working
item.dc:creator: @Staccia Staccia
item.description:
@Staccia wrote:

rofl, you need to turn off your server before you do it. thats why it says Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? no shit

Read full topic

item.title: Restartserver.bat not working
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

put like this…

@echo off
title yourscape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
